local_intent: Execute pick of white_plate using computed pinch grasp (white_grasp)
assumptions: white_plate is visible and within reachable workspace
gripper is open and empty before grasp
collision-free approach path exists above white_plate
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'grasp' phase of the GLOBAL_BT: perceives the white plate, computes a pinch grasp, aligns, executes Pick, and verifies grasp stability; complements earlier detection and gripper opening steps in the global plan.
